page.title: 19BUILDING ON DANESHOLME
page.content: Building on Danesholme started about 15 years ago.There is no more room for houses so more private housing is being built near{Great Oakley,}and some people are moving there from Danesholme. Before you build the house the ground is flattened using machinery.Pegs are put into the ground where the foundations are going to be,and string is tied round them.The walls are built up to floor level and the{damp proof {course}is put in. There are 2 walls with a{cavity}in between.When the walls are high enough wooden beams are placed for the ceiling.Roof timbers are triangle shaped,because it is stronger. {Waterproof}material and tiles are then placed on top.
